pagesAbout1: This course is designed for enthusiasts with no sports or yoga background in eight sessions.
pagesAbout3: **Coming Soon** If you are familiar with the basics of yoga or have completed the beginner course, this course is suitable for you. Each term consists of eight sessions, and a new cycle is presented every month. You have only one month from the registration date to attend these sessions.
pagesAbout5: **Coming Soon** This course is suitable for enthusiasts with at least one year of yoga experience. Each term includes eight sessions with diverse and new exercises for intermediate to advanced levels. You have one month from the registration date to attend these sessions.
pagesAbout7: Mohadeseh strives to provide yoga teachings for anyone seeking a complete solution for their mind and body. A response she received after a serious accident. She was a former competitive swimmer until her life took a different turn due to an accident. After this accident, she had to rest completely for up to 8 months. During this time, she almost completely lost her physical abilities, and miraculously, she remained unharmed after a spinal cord injury. After this incident, she became familiar with yoga, a discipline she considered the most comprehensive answer to her physical and mental needs. After receiving this ray of light and energy, she decided to share it with others who are thirsty for this light.
pagesAbout91: What should I do to participate in online classes ?
pagesAbout92: After choosing the course you want to participate in, proceed to pay the class fee via
pagesAbout94: provided in your user panel. Then access to the course will be available in your user panel.
pagesAbout10: What should I do to attend in-person classes?
pagesAbout13: , the registration officer will contact you and guide you during the registration for the new term.
pagesAbout14: Where are the in-person classes held?
pagesAbout16: Are the classes broadcast live online?
pagesAbout17: No, due to internet limitations and the busy current lifestyles, an opportunity has been provided for you as enthusiasts to watch the classes anytime you want. Therefore, all sessions are available to you right from the beginning and you can benefit from these sessions until the end of the term.
pagesAbout18: What if I can't attend the sessions in one term?
pagesAbout19: After five weeks, your access to the videos will be cut off, and there is no possibility of refund or transfer of sessions. You must plan to be able to practice an average of two sessions per week.
pagesAbout20: Is it possible to change the level after registration and the start of the course?
pagesAbout21: Yes, if you feel the class is too hard or easy for you within 48 hours, you can change your class level by coordinating with the admin.
pagesAbout22: Is it possible to withdraw from the course?
pagesAbout23: Yes, in case of withdrawal within 48 hours, the entire course fee will be refunded to you. After 48 hours, withdrawal is not possible, and the responsibility for not attending the sessions lies with the participant.
pagesAbout24: How long are the classes and how many sessions are in each course?
pagesAbout25: Each class is one hour, and each course includes eight sessions per month.
pagesAbout260: what do I need for the classes.
pagesAbout26: One yoga mat (thickness: 6mm). One belt (length: 3 meters). Two yoga bricks. One small blanket or towel.
pagesAbout27: Can I participate in the class if I have a physical injury?
pagesAbout28: Your doctor's opinion takes precedence. With the doctor's approval, if there is a serious injury, only in-person classes are allowed.
pagesAbout29: How long do I have to stay at each level to master the movements?
pagesAbout30: Due to differences in sports background, exercise duration, genetics, and individual interest, it varies. Usually, it takes between several months to a year of continuous practice for the movements to settle in your body.
pagesTerms2: Participants using online class services (link to classes page) are not allowed to record, download, or share classes and disclose their usernames and passwords to others, ethically and culturally.
pagesTerms3: Pupils can watch each class session up to 4 times in each monthly course. This limitation is imposed to prevent possible misuse.
pagesTerms4: Participants can hand over their username to the admin after registration to regain access to their desired class. Please note that each course registration includes one month of access to the classes, and access to the classes will be automatically cut off after the month ends.
pagesTerms7: The site and all of its content are subject to copyright law, and any use of its content without the author's permission will not be allowed.
